original_text: Many people of Judah lived in villages with their farms near them. Some of them lived in Kiriath Arba, Dibon and Jekabzeel, and in the villages near those towns. Many people of Judah lived in villages with their farms near them. Some of them lived in Kiriath Arba, Dibon and Jekabzeel, and in the villages near those towns.
korean_text: 마을과 들로 말하면 유다 자손의 일부는 기럇 아르바와 그 주변 동네들과 디본과 그 주변 동네들과 여갑스엘과 그 마을들에 거주하며

sentences.original_text: Many people of Judah lived in villages
Some of them lived in Kiriath Arba, Dibon and Jekabzeel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부는 기럇아르바, 디본과 여가시엘에 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: and in the villages near those towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 도시들 근처의 마을들에 살았습니다
